A4.text: Sweden is a constitutional monarchy and a parliamentary democracy

A6.text: The government operates as a collegial body with collective responsibility.

A7.text: The prime minister is nominated by the Speaker of the Riksdag, and is elected and discharged by vote of the Riksdag.
